posts.author: Duplicate Ryan Kanarek
posts.post_text: June 4, 2016 at 4:56 AM#2Generally: Assign Cue x /trig=followIf you want the macro to ask you which cue: Assign Cue (what cue #?) /trig=followIf you want the macro to perform the operation on the current cue: Assign Cue /trig=followThe above all assume the selected exec.
